Functions

ui_ComboList

FUNCTION ui_ComboList(p_colName STRING, p_query STRING)

Sets the INCLUDE values in a Combo widget

 call ui_ComboList("honorific", "Mr|Mrs|Miss|Ms")
 call ui_ComboList("state", "SELECT stateId, name FROM states")

Parameters:
p_colName - Field or column name of combo widget
p_query - SQL statement or a pipe (|) separated list of tuples where each tuple may be value,description pair sep by (^)

ui_FieldGet

FUNCTION ui_FieldGet(p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get an attribute from a Field node in the current window

 define p_value string
 let p_value = ui_FieldGet("customer.name", "varType")

Parameters:
p_name - Name of field (either name=table.column or colName=column)
p_attrib - Attribute of field
Returns:
Value of attribute

ui_FieldNode

FUNCTION ui_FieldNode(p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Return node for a Form Field identified by name

 define d_custid om.DomNode
 let d_custid = ui_FieldNode("custid")

Parameters:
p_name - Name of field (either name=table.column or colName=column)
Returns:
DomNode of FormField

ui_FieldSet

FUNCTION ui_FieldSet(p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set an attribute of a Field node in the current window

 call ui_FieldSet(p_name, p_attrib, p_value)

Parameters:
p_name - Name of field (either name=table.column or colName=column)
p_attrib - Attribute of field
p_value - Value to set attribute to

ui_ItemGet

FUNCTION ui_ItemGet(p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get an attribute from a Form Item in the current window

 define p_value string
 let p_value = ui_ItemGet("Table", "t_list", "tabName")

Parameters:
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
p_attrib - Attribute of item
Returns:
Value of attribute

ui_ItemNode

FUNCTION ui_ItemNode(p_class STRING, p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Return Node for a Form Item in the current window

 define d_table om.DomNode
 let d_table = ui_ItemNode("Table", "t_list")

Parameters:
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute - MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
Returns:
DomNode for the named Form Item

ui_ItemSet

FUNCTION ui_ItemSet(p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set an attribute of a Form Item in the current window

 call ui_ItemSet("Table", "t_list", "width", "38")

Parameters:
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
p_attrib - Attribute of item
p_value - Value to set attribute to

ui_MenuAttach

FUNCTION ui_MenuAttach(d_parent om.DomNode, p_class STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_cmd STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Create and attach a Menu object

 define d_menu, d_grp, d_cmd om.DomNode
 let d_menu = ui_ItemNode("TopMenu", "top")
 let d_grp = ui_MenuAttach(d_menu, "TopMenuGroup", "Config", "folder", "")
 let d_menu = ui_MenuAttach(d_grp, "TopMenuCommand", "Setup", "leaf", "teams")

Parameters:
d_parent - DomNode of parent to attach menu object
p_class - TopMenuGroup|TopMenuCommand|StartMenuGroup|StartMenuCommand
p_text - Text for group
p_image - Optional image
p_cmd - Command (shell) to execute
Returns:
DomNode of menu object

ui_NodeFind

FUNCTION ui_NodeFind(d_root om.DomNode, p_class STRING, p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Finds first Node matching Class (tag) and Name

 define d_win, d_group om.DomNode
 let d_win = om_WindowNode(NULL)
 let d_group = ui_NodeFind(d_win, "Group", "gPage")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node (defaults to UI node)
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
Returns:
First Node that matches

ui_NodeGet

FUNCTION ui_NodeGet(d_root om.DomNode, p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get an Attribute from a Node

 define d_win om.DomNode, p_value string
 let d_win = om_WindowNode(NULL)
 let p_value = ui_NodeGet(d_win, "Group", "gPage", "text")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node (NULL defaults to UI node) to search from
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
p_attrib - Attribute of item
Returns:
Value of attribute

ui_NodeListFind

FUNCTION ui_NodeListFind(d_root om.DomNode, p_class STRING, p_name STRING) RETURNING om.NodeList

Finds a List of Nodes matching Class and Name

 define d_win om.DomNode, d_list om.NodeList
 let d_win = om_WindowNode(NULL)
 let d_list = ui_NodeListFind(d_win, "LocalAction", "interrupt")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node (defaults to UI node)
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
Returns:
NodeList of matched nodes

ui_NodeSet

FUNCTION ui_NodeSet(d_root om.DomNode, p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set an attribute of a Node in the current window

 define d_win om.DomNode
 let d_win = om_WindowNode(NULL)
 call ui_NodeSet(d_win, "Group", "gPage", "text", "Instances")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node (defaults to UI node)
p_class - Class of Form Item (node tag: Eg. Table, Group, Grid, ...)
p_name - Name attribute, MUST have NAME defined for Item in form spec
p_attrib - Attribute of item
p_value - Value to set attribute to

ui_StyleGet

FUNCTION ui_StyleGet(p_style STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get Style Attribute

 define p_value string
 let p_value = ui_StyleGet("Label.Heading", "fontFamily")

Parameters:
p_style - Style name
p_attrib - Style attribute
Returns:
Style Attribute value

ui_StyleSet

FUNCTION ui_StyleSet(p_style STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set Style Attribute

 call ui_StyleSet("Label.Heading", "fontFamily", "Helvetica")

Parameters:
p_style - Style name
p_attrib - Style attribute
p_value - Value to set attribute to

ui_TableSize

FUNCTION ui_TableSize(p_table STRING, p_rows INTEGER)

Sets maximum number of rows in table

 call ui_TableSize("t_list", 100)

Parameters:
p_table - Name of table in current form
p_rows - Number of rows

ui_WidgetGet

FUNCTION ui_WidgetGet(p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get an attribute from a Field Widget in the current window Widget is typically a child of a FormField or TableColumn

define p_value string let p_value = ui_WidgetGet(NULL, "custid", "color") let p_value = ui_WidgetGet("TableColumn/Edit", "account", "format")

Parameters:
p_class - Class - defaults to FormField/* or TableColumn/* but can specify specific eg. TableColumn/Edit
p_name - Name of field in primary node
p_attrib - Attribute of field
Returns:
Value of attribute

ui_WidgetNode

FUNCTION ui_WidgetNode(p_class STRING, p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Get Node for a Field Widget in the current window Widget is typically a child of a FormField or TableColumn

 define d_cust om.DomNode
 let d_cust = ui_WidgetNode("", "formonly.custid")
 let d_cust = ui_WidgetNode("FormField/ButtonEdit", "custid")

Parameters:
p_class - Class - defaults to FormField/* or TableColumn/*
p_name - Name of field in primary node
Returns:
Node for a Class of widget identified by Name

ui_WidgetSet

FUNCTION ui_WidgetSet(p_class STRING, p_name STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set an attribute of a Field Widget in the current window

 call ui_WidgetSet("", "password", "isPassword", TRUE)
 call ui_WidgetSet("FormField/*", "password", "isPassword", TRUE)

Parameters:
p_class - Class - defaults to FormField/* or TableColumn/*
p_name - Name of field in primary node
p_attrib - Attribute of field
p_value - Value to set attribute to

ui_WindowTitle

FUNCTION ui_WindowTitle(p_text STRING)

Set the Title bar text of the current window

 call ui_WindowTitle("My Window")

Parameters:
p_text - Window Text
